title: What Companies Should Know About the Class of 2022
sub_head: Our survey shows that many graduates aren’t necessarily looking for what recruiters think they are looking for
body:
Tom Gimbel is the founder and chief executive of LaSalle Network, a national staffing and recruiting firm based in Chicago.
For the past seven years, my firm has surveyed graduating classes on what they want in their first job and employer postgraduation. Based on data collected from this year’s survey to more than 2,500 college students, the class of 2022 has some notable—and surprising—attributes that should affect how companies recruit from this group.
